Name: appalachian_pactmap14_image
Abstract: This map represents a scanned image of  "Map no. 14" published by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club drafted by E.P. Schreier and edited by Myron Avery in 1941.  It contains State and U.S highways, primary and secondary roads, Appalachian and other trails, railroads, Mountain peak and spring water locations in Souther Virginia.
FgdcText:

    </citation>
    <descript>
      <abstract>This map represents a scanned image of  "Map no. 14" published by Potomac Appalachian Trail Club drafted by E.P. Schreier and edited by Myron Avery in 1941.  It contains State and U.S highways, primary and secondary roads, Appalachian and other trails, railroads, Mountain peak and spring water locations in Souther Virginia.</abstract>
      <purpose>The map may be useful to trace historical changes of trail routes for research purpose. </purpose>
    </descript>
